pkgmetadata.longdescription: VIF Regression: A Fast Regression Algorithm For Large Data // This package implements a fast regression algorithm for building linear model for large data as defined in the paper "VIF-Regression: A Fast Regression Algorithm for Large Data (2011), Journal of the American Statistical Association, Vol. 106, No. 493: 232-247" by Dongyu Lin, Dean P. Foster, and Lyle H. Ungar.
